00021 
00022 #ifndef _ThreadSafeQueue_h
00023 #define _ThreadSafeQueue_h
00024 
00025 #include "VRTObject.h"
00026 #include <queue>
00027 #include <pthread.h>
00028 #include <errno.h>
00029 #include <iostream>
00030 //#include <time.h>
00031 #include <sys/time.h>
00032 
00033 using namespace std;
00034 
00035 namespace vrt {
00037   template <typename T>
00038   class ThreadSafeQueue {
00039     private: queue<T*>       q;
00040     private: pthread_mutex_t lock;
00041     private: pthread_cond_t  cond;
00042     private: size_t          maxSize;
00043     private: timeval         tv;
00044     private: timespec        ts;
00045     private: bool            purgeWhenFull;
00046 
00051     public: ThreadSafeQueue (size_t maxSize, bool purgeWhenFull=false) :
00052       maxSize(maxSize),
00053       purgeWhenFull(purgeWhenFull)
00054     {
00055       pthread_mutex_init(&lock,NULL);
00056       pthread_cond_init(&cond,NULL);
00057     }
00058 
00060     public: ~ThreadSafeQueue () {
00061       pthread_mutex_destroy(&lock);
00062     }
00063 
00067     private: inline int lockMutex () {
00068       return pthread_mutex_lock(&lock);
00069     }
00070 
00074     private: inline int unlockMutex () {
00075       return pthread_mutex_unlock(&lock);
00076     }
00077 
00081     private: inline int notify () {
00082       return pthread_cond_signal(&cond);
00083     }
00084 
00089     private: inline int wait (uint64_t timeout) {
00090       gettimeofday(&tv, NULL);
00091       ts.tv_nsec = tv.tv_usec*1000 + timeout;
00092       ts.tv_sec  = tv.tv_sec + ts.tv_nsec / 1000000000;
00093       ts.tv_nsec %= 1000000000;
00094       return pthread_cond_timedwait(&cond, &lock, &ts);
00095     }
00096 
00100     private: inline int wait () {
00101       return pthread_cond_wait(&cond, &lock);
00102     }
00103 
00107     public: void push (T* obj) {
00108       lockMutex();
00109       if (q.size() >= maxSize) {
00110         if (purgeWhenFull) {
00111           cout << "WARNING: queue filled, dropping " << (maxSize/4) << " packets" << endl;
00112           for (size_t i = 0; i < maxSize/4; i++) {
00113             q.pop();
00114           }
00115         }
00116         else {
00117           wait();
00118         }
00119       }
00120       q.push(obj);
00121       notify();
00122       unlockMutex();
00123     }
00124 
00128     public: size_t getSize () {
00129       return q.size();
00130     }
00131 
00135     public: size_t getMaxSize () {
00136       return maxSize;
00137     }
00138 
00145     public: bool push (T* obj, uint32_t timeout) {
00146       lockMutex();
00147       if (q.size() >= maxSize) {
00148         if (ETIMEDOUT == wait(timeout)) {
00149           unlockMutex();
00150           return false;
00151         }
00152       }
00153       q.push(obj);
00154       notify();
00155       unlockMutex();
00156       return true;
00157     }
00158 
00160     public: T* pop () {
00161       lockMutex();
00162       T* front = NULL;
00163       if (q.size()==0) {
00164         wait();
00165       }
00166       front = q.front();
00167       q.pop();
00168       notify();
00169       unlockMutex();
00170       return front;
00171     }
00172 
00177     public: T* pop (uint64_t timeout) {
00178       lockMutex();
00179       T* front = NULL;
00180       if (q.size()==0) {
00181         int blah = wait(timeout);
00182         if (ETIMEDOUT == blah) {
00183           unlockMutex();
00184           return NULL;
00185         }
00186       }
00187       front = q.front();
00188       q.pop();
00189       notify();
00190       unlockMutex();
00191       return front;
00192     }
00193   };
00194 } END_NAMESPACE
00195 #endif /* _ThreadSafeQueue_h */
